properties.description: Misal Patel and Khushi Shah with MK Group of Properties, powered by eXp Realty, are excited to introduce this beautiful family home - offering space, style, and a fantastic location in the heart of Mile End. Discover the perfect balance of style, space, and low-maintenance living in this move-in ready Torrens-titled home, ideally positioned just minutes from the city. The master bedroom at the front of the home is a true retreat, featuring a ceiling fan, a spacious walk-in wardrobe, and a private ensuite. Bedrooms two and three are located down the hallway, each with built-in wardrobes. The main bathroom is cleverly designed with a separate toilet and vanity area. The light-filled open-plan family and meals area connects beautifully with the modern kitchen. Step outside to a private, versatile entertaining area with a pitched roof and cafÃƒÂ© blinds, allowing you to enjoy this space all year round. A tranquil water feature adds a touch of elegance.
